definitions: Adhering or causing to adhere to something.
Being or becoming fixed in a particular position or unable to move.
Protruding or extending out from something.
Persisting with a task, belief, or situation.
Placing or inserting something somewhere quickly or carelessly.
examples: The glue is sticking the pieces together.
He was sticking his tongue out.
She is sticking to her diet.
He was sticking notes on the fridge.
